metadata.title: USN-4196-1 -- python-ecdsa vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that python-ecdsa incorrectly handled certain signatures. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause python-ecdsa to generate unexpected exceptions, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2019-14853)  It was discovered that python-ecdsa incorrectly verified DER encoding in signatures. A remote attacker could use this issue to perform certain malleability attacks. (CVE-2019-14859)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4196-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-ecdsa - 0.13-2ubuntu0.18.04.1 python3-ecdsa - 0.13-2ubuntu0.18.04.1 No subscription required
